message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that you've shown interest in. I'm asking for $115 for it. What do you think?
Thanks Alice, I appreciate the offer. However, $115 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now. Would you be willing to go down to $105?
Bob, I understand your position. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $105 is still a bit too low for me. How about we split the difference and go for $110?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, $110 is still a bit outside my budget. How about we meet in the middle at $107.50?

Bob, I'm starting to think we might not be able to reach an agreement. I'm happy to continue discussing it, but I'm really not comfortable going below $110.  If you're willing to go up to that, we can make this work. Otherwise, I may have to look at other options.
